topic.title: Sending your comments to IBM
topic.shortdesc: If you especially like or dislike anything about this documentation, use one of the methods listed to send your comments to IBM.

body.p: Feel free to comment on what you regard as specific errors or omissions, and on the accuracy, organization, subject matter, or completeness of this documentation.
Please limit your comments to the information in this documentation and how the information is presented.

p.b: To make comments about the functions of IBM products or systems, talk to your IBM representative or to your authorized IBM marketing representative.

body.p: When you send comments to IBM, you grant IBM a nonexclusive right to use or distribute your comments in any way it believes appropriate, without incurring any obligation to you.

You can send your comments to IBM in any of the following ways:
By mail, to this address:User Technologies Department (MP095) IBM United Kingdom Laboratories Hursley Park WINCHESTER, Hampshire SO21 2JN United Kingdom
By fax:
From outside the U.K., after your international access code use 44-1962-816151
From within the U.K., use 01962-816151
By email:
idrcf@hursley.ibm.com

Whichever method you use, ensure that you include:
The publication title
The topic to which your comment applies
Your name and address/telephone number/fax number/email address.
